recommended_degree: Kimia, Bioteknologi, Teknik Kimia, Biologi (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
1.Familiar with global sustainability regulations. 
2.Familiar with biodegradability & compostability certifications. 
3.Proven ability to execute experiments and documentation. 
4.Strong analytical skills and detailed oriented. 
5.Ability to explain complex scientific concepts to non-technical stakeholders. 
6.A strong commitment to reducing plastic waste and promoting eco-friendly solutions.
